title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie

ingredients.name: ice cubes (optional, if using fresh fruit)

directions: Add all ingredients to a blender.
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed.
Pour into a glass and enjoy immediately.
notes: Can be made dairy-free by using non-dairy milk and yogurt. Add protein powder for extra protein. Can also be turned into a smoothie bowl by using less liquid and topping with granola and fruit.
